meta.article_title: September 7, 2015 - Never Look for a Winner

neither-look-for-a-winner_.probleme: Looking for shots to put away
neither-look-for-a-winner_.diagnostic: Consciously looking for shots instead of letting training take over

debutant.description: Feed multiball and mix in difficult and easy shots, putting away the easy ones. Consciously think about whether you went for the right shot after each attempt.

debutant.nom: Practice matches with a partner or coach
debutant.description: Practice serve and attack, judging whether your partner's return can be put away. Clear your mind and let reactions take over. Consciously think about whether you went for the right shot after each rally.

exercices_complementaires.description: Practice judging whether your partner's return can be put away. Clear your mind and let reactions take over.
